title: Security settings
content_access_info: Allow access of URL starting with content://
local_file_info_info: Allow access of URL starting with file://
local_file_info_sandbox_info: Allow access only in external storage and /data/data/jp.hazuki.yuzubrowser/app_public_html.
local_file_info_enable_info: Allow access to all accessible paths.
insecure_info_info: Allows to load scripts and images etc. on http on https page
insecure_info_compatibility_info:
Decide automatically whether to load
Judgment may change depending on WebView/Chrome update
security_warn_info:
Display a warning if there is a problem with SSL certificate and confirm whether to continue loading.
If it is invalid, the load is automatically canceled.
